original_text: “From the outcry at Heshbon even to Elealeh, as far as Jahaz they utter their voice, from Zoar to Horonaim and Eglath-shelishiyah. For the waters of Nimrim also have become desolate.
korean_text: 헤스본에서 엘르알레를 지나 야하스까지와 소알에서 호로나임을 지나 에글랏 셀리시야에 이르는 지역에 사는 사람들이 소리를 내어 부르짖음은 니므림의 물도 황폐하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: From the outcry at Heshbon even to Elealeh,
as far as Jahaz they utter their voice,
from Zoar to Horonaim and Eglath-shelishiyah.
For the waters of Nimrim also have become desolate.
